description:
cmd/dist: use separate args for separate compiler flags

This makes dist safe for CL 7035043 (but keeps working now too).

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM

Is it right that this is extracted from CL 7035043 ?
Yes, just trying to avoid merge conflicts with future changes.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=e5d8cdcc49fe ***

cmd/dist: use separate args for separate compiler flags

This makes dist safe for CL 7035043 (but keeps working now too).

R=golang-dev, remyoudompheng
CC=golang-dev
